Text.Language: Luke the Preacher / The beloved Physician / Author of the Gospel of Christ / St. Luke the Evangelist
He told us the story of John, / The Greatest born of women / Elijah who is to come / St. Luke the Evangelist
He sat with you O Mary, / To record the annunciation / How Gabriel came to you / St. Luke the Evangelist
You told of the Incarnation / Of the Wondrous Birth / His circumcision and Sacrifice / St. Luke the Evangelist
You wrote with great detail / To convert all the sceptics / And to strengthen our faith / St. Luke the Evangelist
With understanding you wrote / True is the hidden mystery / Of the Son of God the Word / St. Luke the Evangelist
To speak a little of / The Honor that the Lord / Gave His evangelist / St. Luke the Evangelist
“I do not call you a slave / for a slave does not know / the works of the master…” / St. Luke the Evangelist
“...I call you my brother, / for what I heard from my father / of this I informed you” / St. Luke the Evangelist
I am astounded / And my mind is baffled / Because of the great honor / Of all the Apostles
/ Our Savior cries out to them / Calling them My beloved brethren / Their voices went through all the earth
/ You wrote to Theophilus / Your beloved disciple / About the Acts of our Fathers
/ Peter’s three thousand / St. Stephen’s Martyrdom / Saul’s Conversion to Paul
/ You gave us the beginning / Of our beloved Church / To pave the way for all Christians
Your teaching went out / To the whole earth / To the ends of the world / St. Luke the Evangelist
Like the salt of the earth / Your teachings seasoned the world / You cried out saying / St. Luke the Evangelist
“Do not fear little Flock / For your Father was pleased / To give you the kingdom” / St. Luke the Evangelist
O one who medicates our souls / Luke the Apostle of Christ / Deserving of every Honor / St. Luke the Evangelist
Oh great physician, / The Pure evangelist / For you truly deserve this name / St. Luke the Evangelist
The mention of your name / Is on all the believers’ mouths / They all say O God of St. Luke / Help all of us
